entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 60 early this morning then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 17 April 2023
